page.title: 20ANDREW'S DAY
page.content: I am up before 7.For{breakfast}I only want cereal.We have to go for the bus at 7.45.The bus goes all around the villages before it gets to Cardinham School at 8:30.In the playground we play "chaintig" you have to catch someone then you have to hold hands and catch someone else.School starts at 9.Most people stay to school lunch because they live too far away to walk home.School ends at 3:30.We wait until the bus comes then we go home.At home there are calves to feed and other {jobs}to do.Then{we play until it is {dinner time.}We often play in the fields or building dams in the stream.We can also use{the computer.}I go to bed at about 8:30.
